Description:
Performs the following at PBE1PBE/6-31G(d,p) using Gaussian 16:

  * Ground optimisation (with frequency)
  * TDA excited states (10 singlets, 10 triplets)
Comment: Used for characterising organic, fluorescent or TADF emitters

Description:
Performs the following at PBE1PBE/6-31G(d,p), in toluene, using Gaussian 16:

  * Ground optimisation (with frequency)
  * TDA excited states (10 singlets, 10 triplets)
  * Optimised TDA S\ :sub:`1`
Comment: Used for characterising organic, fluorescent or TADF emitters including emission energy

Description:
Performs the following at B3LYP/6-31+G(d,p), using SBKJC-VDZ-ECP for metals, in MeCN, using Gaussian 16:

  * Ground optimisation (with frequency)
  * TD-DFT excited states (10 singlets, 10 triplets)
  * Optimised unrestricted triplet T\ :sub:`1` (with frequency)
  * Ground state energy (S\ :sub:`0`\ ) at the T\ :sub:`1` geometry
Comment: Used for characterising organometallic, phosphorescent emitters

Description:
Performs the following at SCS-ADC(2)/cc-pVDZ using Turbomole:

  * Ground optimisation
  * S\ :sub:`1` and S\ :sub:`2` excited states
  * T\ :sub:`1` and T\ :sub:`2` excited states
Comment: Used for characterising multiple-resonant TADF emitters

Description: Optimisation (with frequency) at PBE1PBE/6-31G(d,p) using Gaussian 16
Optimisation (with frequency) at B3LYP/6-31G(d,p) using Gaussian 16
Optimisation (with frequency) at B3LYP/6-31+G(d,p), using SBKJC-VDZ-ECP for metals, in MeCN, using Gaussian 16
TDA excited states at PBE1PBE/6-31G(d,p) using Gaussian 16
TD-DFT excited states at B3LYP/6-31+G(d,p), using SBKJC-VDZ-ECP for metals, in MeCN, using Gaussian 16
TDA excited states (100 singlets) at PBE1PBE/6-31G(d,p), in toluene, using Gaussian 16
TD-DFT excited states (100 singlets) at B3LYP/6-31+G(d,p), using SBKJC-VDZ-ECP for metals, in MeCN, using Gaussian 16
Comment: For modelling absorption spectra of organometallics
